title: Help FPS
body: Hi i have a MSI 970 graphics card, and a pretty op monitor, pretty sure the thing is 144hz. IM wondering what do i adjust my settings to, to get the best performance out of my computer. Also when i uncap my FPS is gets all glitchy and shoots up to like 500-300, y is this? any help would be great.

replies.body: You might be having outdated driver or hardware issues that's causing your frames to drop.  Go over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide for a list of steps to fix this up, starting with your drivers.  That should get you squared away!
